snippet: Hess gas stations are no more, but its annual toy truck is back. Hess Toy Trucks on Monday unveiled a red fire truck and ladder rescue that will go on sale Nov. 1.
abstract: Hess toy trucks will be available online and at mall kiosks during holiday season, despite company's decision to sell all of its retail gas stations.
lead_paragraph: Hess gas stations are no more, but its annual toy truck is back. Hess Toy Trucks on Monday unveiled a red fire truck and ladder rescue that will go on sale Nov. 1.

headline.main: Hess Keeps Up Toy Tradition, Even After Selling Gas Stations
headline.print_headline: Hess Keeps Up Toy Tradition, Even After Selling Gas Stations
